name: Feature Development Workflow
description: Automated workflow for developing new features from conception to deployment

subtasks.title: Design feature architecture
subtasks.description: Create technical design, define requirements, and plan implementation approach

subtasks.title: Implement core functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the main feature components and business logic

subtasks.title: Write comprehensive tests
subtasks.description: Create unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for the feature

subtasks.title: Perform code review
subtasks.description: Review code quality, security, and adherence to coding standards

subtasks.title: Deploy feature to production
subtasks.description: Release feature to production environment with appropriate monitoring

subtasks.title: Monitor feature performance
subtasks.description: Track feature usage and performance to ensure successful deployment
